docs.snippet: FORT LEAVENWORTH, Kan., Nov. 25--Politics being taboo at a service institution such as the new Command and Staff College here, official discussions of its aims omit its role in the event unification of the armed forces is finally decreed by Congress.

docs.abstract: Assembly Pol and Security Com adopts resolution providing that UN member nations submit repts on total mobilized forces, both at home and abroad, by Jan 1; secret police troops included in survey; USSR proposals to include other armament questions defeated; last-minute Brit amendment making census subject to verification "on the spot" by UN inspection body also defeated; US proposal that repts be submitted as of Dec 15 adopted; com passing of resolution by 25 to 19 vote with 7 abstentions noted; nations line-up and Molotov, Noel-Baker and Connally roles at session described
